resources.string: An error occurred while deleting the account. Try again.
An error occurred during authorization. Try again.
Please wait\nfor the download to complete.
Во время загрузки произошла ошибка. Попробуйте еще раз.

Please Log in!
 		In order to use the chat and map of the program it is necessary for you to log in.
 		By login into the program you agree to our privacy policy and terms of use of the program: Your email address, name and surname that are written in your email account, and your location will be used in the program.

The app uses the device\'s GPS to determine the location of the device. It is necessary to determine your location so that the users of the program can see you and contact you. The location of the phone may be subject to an additional charge. For details, contact your mobile operator.
Are you sure you want to delete the account and leave the program?
You do not have any friends! Add friends to your list or invite your friends to the program.
Are you sure you want to remove a friend from the list?
